title: 1886 Detroit Lorillard Team Cabinet FS or FT
author: asphaltman

posts.post_title: 1886 Detroit Lorillard Team Cabinet FS or FT
posts.post_content:
Down to $1525 cash (net to me) or consider trade/cash combinations for other types.  About as good of a looking for a PSA 1 as you can get with the front of the card.  Some paper loss accounts for grade on back but also has neat Grocer's stamp. 

[URL="https://ibb.co/R0m64Xr"][IMG]https://i.ibb.co/Z8Pg1Q4/fullsizeoutput-159.jpg[/IMG][/URL][URL="https://ibb.co/wghwCp4"][IMG]https://i.ibb.co/r02cM5H/fullsizeoutput-160.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
